text.description:
UI Extensions and HUD
https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/552
Code: https://github.com/kuertee/x4-mod-ui-extensions.git
by kuertee. Contributors: Forleyor, Mycu.
Features:
Modded Lua files with callbacks that allow more than one mod to change the same UI element.
Functionality that adds HUD elements to the Top Level Menu.
Allows other mods to create guidance missions (i.e. missiontype.guidance) that will be listed in the Guidance Missions tab. Also enables the Set Active and Set Inactive buttons in missions listed in the Guidance Missions tab.
